dataset_info.name: TriCH-Bench v2
dataset_info.description: Tri-lingual Cultural Heritage Benchmark v2 - Hai Xian 18 Techniques (Original Texts). Migrated from hai_xian_18_cme_dataset.json for ACM JOCCH Visual Heritage special issue.
dataset_info.citation: Yu, H. et al. (2026). TriCH-Bench: A Tri-lingual Cultural Heritage Benchmark for Visual Heritage Understanding. ACM Journal on Computing and Cultural Heritage.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用十分尖筆，如曹衣紋、鍊筆擎納衣褶，蒼老緊牢，古人多描
text.modern_zh: 用极尖的毛笔画出纤细均匀的线条，笔法源自曹衣纹的传统，提按运笔间描绘衣褶，笔力苍劲老练、紧密牢固，古代画家多用此法。
text.en: Fine brush creates continuous silk-like lines with uniform thickness and classical elegance. Used by Gu Kaizhi for celestial figures, producing ethereal drapery with divine spiritual qualities.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

image_ref.path: data/海仙十八描法/c01.高古游丝描.jpg

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用正鋒，如琴絃，中無怒降，要心手相應
text.modern_zh: 以中锋运笔，线条如绷紧的琴弦般挺直均匀，行笔中不出现突然变粗的“怒降”，要求画家心意与手法完美配合。
text.en: Centered brush produces taut string-like lines requiring mind-hand coordination. Creates precise, dignified drapery suitable for scholarly figures with controlled elegance and musical harmony principles.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 作正鋒，長點如以錐鏤石面，書法謂先楷而後草，畫亦然
text.modern_zh: 以中锋运笔，长笔画如同用尖锥在石面上刻字般遒劲有力。书法讲究先学楷书再学草书，绘画的道理也是如此。
text.en: Steady centered strokes resemble iron wire firmness with consistent thickness. Follows calligraphic principles creating strong architectural drapery lines providing structural foundation and permanence.

cultural_concepts.term_en: calligraphy and painting share the same origin

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 正鋒雄豪而要練筆，雲章鎖然，出溪水紋，曲流而如向風
text.modern_zh: 以中锋运笔，笔势雄健豪放但需要深厚的练笔功底。线条如云纹般层叠连贯，又似溪水波纹般曲折流转，宛如迎风飘动。
text.en: Bold practiced strokes flow naturally like drifting clouds and streaming water. Creates graceful undulating drapery suggesting movement and vitality in windswept environments.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

image_ref.path: data/海仙十八描法/c04.行云流水描.jpg

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 正鋒用尖筆成圭角，如螞蟥繃
text.modern_zh: 以中锋配合尖笔，运笔形成棱角分明的转折，线条中段肥壮、两端渐收，形如蚂蝗绷起的身体。
text.en: Pointed brush forms angular shapes thick in middle, narrow at ends like leech body. Produces distinctive volume-emphasizing folds effective for heavy garments.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

work_name.en: Nail Head and Rat Tail Drawing

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 正鋒而釘頭掃筆，為鼠尾用細筆
text.modern_zh: 以中锋运笔，起笔时重按如钉头般粗壮，然后以扫笔之势推进，收笔时改用细笔轻收，形成如鼠尾般纤细的末端。
text.en: Nail-like stroke beginnings taper to rat-tail endings using fine brush techniques. Creates dynamic drapery with emphatic starts and delicate conclusions for flowing fabrics.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

image_ref.path: data/海仙十八描法/c06.钉头鼠尾描.jpg

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 以淡墨成衣紋，而用濃墨，人多畫之
text.modern_zh: 先用淡墨勾画衣纹轮廓，再用浓墨加以强调叠加，淡浓交替形成丰富的墨色层次。此法灵活实用，古代画家多采用。
text.en: Combines light ink foundation with concentrated ink emphasis, utilizing multiple techniques. Represents technical flexibility producing layered effects accommodating varied fabric weights and lighting.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用禿筆為釘頭，牢插筆下，疾若奔馬
text.modern_zh: 用秃笔（笔头磨损的旧笔）画出钉头般的起笔，下笔坚定牢固地插入纸面，行笔速度迅疾如奔马。
text.en: Worn brush creates nail-head beginnings with swift galloping-horse execution. Associated with Ma Yuan and Xia Gui, producing bold confident strokes for dynamic action.

cultural_concepts.term_en: Ma Yuan and Xia Gui (Southern Song painters)

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

image_ref.path: data/海仙十八描法/c08.撅头钉描.jpg

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用尖筆，其體重疊衣褶，緊窄如蚯蚓描
text.modern_zh: 用尖笔描绘，以密集重叠的衣褶为特征，线条紧密窄小，形态类似蚯蚓描。此法源自北齐曹仲达“曹衣出水”的画风。
text.en: Pointed brush creates densely overlapping tight narrow folds similar to earthworm technique. Named after Cao Buqing, emphasizing body-hugging drapery and fine fabric.

cultural_concepts.term_en: Cao-style drapery (after Cao Buqing / Cao Zhongda)

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用尖大筆，筆頭擎納而成細長
text.modern_zh: 使用尖而大的毛笔，通过提按运笔的动作画出细长的线条，转折处如芦苇折断般干脆利落。
text.en: Large pointed brush with lifting motions creates elongated strokes suggesting broken reed stems. Developed by Liang Kai, producing crisp geometric angular precision.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 筆下忌釘頭怒降，心手相應而如柳葉
text.modern_zh: 运笔时避免出现钉头般的重按和怒降般的突变，追求心手合一的境界，线条如柳叶般轻柔优美、两端尖细。
text.en: Flowing leaf-like curves avoid angular changes, maintaining coordination like willow movement. Associated with Wu Daozi, creating graceful organic drapery suggesting feminine elegance.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用竹筆，橫臥為肥短，擎納如竹葉
text.modern_zh: 使用竹制笔，笔身横卧画出肥短的笔触，通过提按动作使线条呈现竹叶般短阔饱满的形态。
text.en: Bamboo brush held horizontally creates short plump strokes mirroring bamboo leaf shapes. Produces distinctive segmented folds suggesting natural botanical decorative patterns.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 正鋒而筆下要藏鋒疾，如一搨波
text.modern_zh: 以中锋运笔，笔锋藏入笔画之中快速行进，线条带有颤动效果，如同水面上泛起的一层波纹。
text.en: Centered brush with swift concealed movements creates quivering water-ripple effects. Requires controlled trembling technique producing dynamic shimmering drapery suggesting emotional movement states.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

image_ref.path: data/海仙十八描法/c13.战笔水纹描.jpg

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 馬遠、梁楷多為之，弄筆如彈丸
text.modern_zh: 南宋画家马远、梁楷常用此法，运笔简练迅捷如弹丸弹出，以最少的笔触捕捉人物的神态精髓。
text.en: Simplified movements like bouncing spheres, used by Ma Yuan and Liang Kai. Represents economical expression capturing essential gesture while eliminating superfluous detail.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 又謂柴筆描，以銳筆橫臥為體，大減筆
text.modern_zh: 又称柴笔描，以锐利的笔锋横卧运笔为主要特征，用笔极为简省。线条枯涩苍劲如干枯的柴枝。
text.en: Sharp brush held horizontally with reduced ink creates rough textural strokes resembling dried wood. Produces weathered aged effects suitable for hermits.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用墨秀潤肥壯，用正鋒筆，惹成藏鋒，首尾忌怒降
text.modern_zh: 用墨讲究秀丽润泽，线条肥壮饱满。以中锋运笔，笔锋含蓄内敛，起笔和收笔处不可出现突然的粗细变化，线条圆润如蚯蚓蠕动。
text.en: Moist lustrous ink with centered brush creates concealed effects avoiding angular changes. Named for smooth undulating movement, producing soft rounded luxurious folds.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用尖大筆為擊納，如橄欖，忌惹筆鼠尾
text.modern_zh: 使用尖而大的毛笔，以击打和按压的笔法画出线条，形状如橄榄般两头尖细中间饱满，须避免出现鼠尾般拖沓的收笔。
text.en: Large pointed brush creates olive-shaped strokes avoiding rat-tail endings. Named for fruit form, producing bold substantial folds emphasizing weight and ceremonial volume.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.

source_provenance.original_text: 海仙十八描法 (Hai Xian Eighteen Drawing Techniques)

text.classical_zh: 用尖筆成藏鋒，而筆頭為玉，如棗核，又謂觀音描
text.modern_zh: 用尖笔以藏锋法运笔，笔触温润如玉，线条形如枣核般两端尖、中间圆润饱满。此法又称观音描，因其端庄秀雅，适合描绘观音菩萨等神圣形象。
text.en: Pointed brush with concealed effects forms date-pit shapes, also called Guanyin Drawing. Named for seed form, producing elegant symmetrical folds suggesting divine qualities.

expert_review.revision_note: Modern Chinese text rewritten from simplified-character copy to genuine interpretation (2026-02-14). Pending expert re-review.
